verses.verse: Maschil<WH4905> of David;<WH1732> A Prayer<WH8605> when he was in the cave.<WH4631> I cried<WH2199> to the LORD<WH3068> with my voice;<WH6963> with my voice<WH6963> to the LORD<WH3068> did I make my supplication.<WH2603>
I poured<WH8210> out my complaint<WH7879> before<WH6440> him; I showed<WH5046> before<WH6440> him my trouble.<WH6869>

When my spirit<WH7307> was overwhelmed<WH5848> within<WH5921> me, then you knew<WH3045> my path.<WH5410> In the way<WH734> wherein<WH2098> I walked<WH1980> have they privately<WH2934> laid<WH2934> a snare<WH6341> for me.

I looked<WH5027> on my right<WH3225> hand,<WH3225> and beheld,<WH7200> but there was no<WH369> man that would know<WH5234> me: refuge<WH4498> failed<WH6> me; no<WH369> man cared<WH1875> for my soul.<WH5315>
I cried<WH2199> to you, O LORD:<WH3068> I said,<WH559> You are my refuge<WH4268> and my portion<WH2506> in the land<WH776> of the living.<WH2416>
Attend<WH7181> to my cry;<WH7440> for I am brought<WH1809> very<WH3966> low:<WH1809> deliver<WH5337> me from my persecutors;<WH7291> for they are stronger<WH553> than I.

Bring<WH3318> my soul<WH5315> out of prison,<WH4525> that I may praise<WH3034> your name:<WH8034> the righteous<WH6662> shall compass<WH3803> me about; for you shall deal<WH1580> bountifully<WH1580> with me.
